Package frogger.util

Enum TouchChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TouchChecker>
      • frogger.util.TouchChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TouchChecker>
    public enum TouchChecker
extends java.lang.Enum<TouchChecker>
    The TouchChecker is a utility to handle the touch event about the frog.

    Note: this class is a singleton with Enum.

      • touchActor

        public void touchActor​(Frog frog,
                       java.util.ArrayList<AutomaticActor> automaticActors,
                       java.util.ArrayList<End> ends)
        Checks if touch event happens.
        Parameters:
        frog - the frog that controlled by the player
        automaticActors - the automatic actors which could be touched by the frog
        ends - the ends which could be activated by the frog
        See Also:
        #run

      • touchWater

        private boolean touchWater​(Frog frog)
        Check if the frog is in the water.
        Parameters:
        frog - the frog that controlled by the player
        Returns:
        true if the frog is in the water; false otherwise
